author: Blake Schuster
title: Report: Mets Trying to 'Drum Up Interest' in Sale During Coronavirus Hiatus
description: The  New York Mets  aren't letting Major League Baseball's hiatus stop them from achieving one of their ultimate goals: selling the team...
content:
Al Bello/Getty Images
The New York Mets aren't letting Major League Baseball's hiatus stop them from achieving one of their ultimate goals: selling the team.  
While the baseball season remains indefinitely suspended because of the coronavirus pandemic, the… [+1843 chars]
